index_hero_paragraph: Patient-focused for over 5 years, we serve with honor and bravery all those who walk through our health care facility.
index_red_card_body: Click this number to call us:
index_blue_card_body: Click this link for an appointment:
index_gray_card_body: Click this link for more information:
index_video_paragraph: A private health training, created on September 04, 2017. We are located in Babadjou, Mbouda-Bamenda road, Behind Toumaka market, Bamboutos department, Western region.
index_services_paragraph: Discover the list of hospital services we offer for your well-being.
index_services1_paragraph: Our caring doctors put all their experience at your disposal to offer you the best diagnosis.
index_services2_paragraph: Qualified and experienced surgeons will use their professionalism to get you back on your feet.
index_services3_paragraph: We have a medical analysis laboratory with the best equipment.
index_services4_paragraph: Our massage therapist is a specialist in disrupted movement. His goal is to restore your body's 'functional abilities', such as its ability to mobilize its limbs.
index_services5_paragraph: Smile at life with gentle dental care performed in a clean, friendly setting!
index_services6_paragraph: The ophthalmologist focuses on the structure and function of your eyes, as well as the diseases and abnormalities that can affect them.
index_services7_paragraph: In clean, welcoming delivery rooms, our midwives have delivered hundreds of healthy babies.
index_services8_paragraph: Regular childhood immunization programs are held at our health care facility. Don't hesitate to protect your child!
index_services9_paragraph: Earn a degree or certificate that effectively prepares you for the professional world.
index_services10_paragraph: Our medical imaging experts offer reliable ultrasound and radiology for your wellness quest.
index_services11_paragraph: The orthopedist is responsible for the diagnosis and medical and surgical management of diseases of the musculoskeletal system, i.e. bones, joints, ligaments, muscles, tendons and nerves.
index_services12_paragraph: Equipped with a variety of medications to meet any eventuality, our pharmacy is open 24 hours a day.
index_services13_paragraph: Mothers with children, couples, and young people can benefit from counseling and follow-up sessions organized by our health professionals.
price_paragraph: In order to provide health care to all social classes, we offer quality services at low prices.
index_doctors_paragraph: Experienced and dedicated, we always give our patients the time and empathy they need. We go out of our way to understand your needs. Always there for you!
index_testimonials_paragraph: Our patients love us! Here is what they say about us.
index_testimonial1_paragraph: They completed my surgery with a highly trained, experienced and professional team. Thank you for a great experience!
index_testimonial2_paragraph: For a long time, I went to doctors in vain. At the Prestige Health Clinic, I was diagnosed and treated correctly.
index_testimonial3_paragraph: The midwives reassured and encouraged me during the birth of my first child. Their attention had a profound effect on me. Thank you for your humanity!
index_formations_paragraph: With the Prestige Bilingual Medical Academy, secure your professional future!
services_paragraph: We accompany you in your quest for well-being with quality services.
formation_hero_paragraph: A newly created training center in a calm and serene environment. Conducive for quality training and rapid integration into the professional world.
formation_folder_paragraph: Admissions are made on the basis of a file study. The admission file must include:
formation_paper1: Application for admission addressed to the Director
formation_paper2: Photocopy of the diploma according to the chosen course
formation_paper3: Photocopy of the National Identity Card
formation_paper4: Medical certificate dated at least 3 months
formation_paper5: Photocopy of the birth certificate (for those under 18)
formation_minefopsection_paragraph: Diplomas and certificates of professional qualifications
formation_minesupsection_paragraph: Under the sponsorship of MINESUP to obtain the BTS.
activities_paragraph: A pictorial tour of Prestige Health Clinic and its activities.
contact_paragraph: Fill out this form or call us for reservations or information.
contact_localiz_parag: Babadjou, Mbouda-Bamenda road, behind Toumaka market
